item.title: Miller (Level 4)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 185 times with git add -p.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 160 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 2)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 155 times with git add -p.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 9)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 1)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 7)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 8)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Pilgrim (Level 5)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Investigator (Level 6)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Thug (Level 7)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Hunter (Level 6)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Presenter (Level 6)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.
